item.title: Page Includes
item.content:encoded:
Right now this wiki does not use many includes, or templates as us wikipedians are used to calling them. This is a very powerful tool that can greatly simplify repetitive work. I can especially see this being used on mission and character pages. I've added an example include (located here) based on Uzuki's character box, which I've also used in my user page.

You use it as follows:
[[include CharBox
|portrait=
|headband=
|villagename=
|villageloc=
|name=
|level=
|rank=
|genlevel=
|genbonus=
|genstr=
|genrange=
|gensuc=
|ninlevel=
|ninbonus=
|ninstr=
|ninrange=
|ninsuc=
|tailevel=
|taibonus=
|taistr=
|tairange=
|taisuc=
]]

(Note: I'm still getting used to how WikiDot handles includes, so it's not quite perfect.)
